resources.string:
下水道工人

Connect the terminals to the server by rotating the tiles. Select tiles with the arrows; press Z, N or 4 to rotate a tile left; M, X or 6 to rotate right; tap the screen if your device supports it. Press space or 0 to lock a tile when you think it's correct.

Tiles which are connected are shown highlighted. Use the menu to select different skill levels, pause the game, or start a new game.

Tap the screen to start.

Scrambled Net

Connect the terminals to the server by rotating the tiles. Select tiles with the arrows; press Z, N or 4 to rotate a tile left; M, X or 6 to rotate right; tap the screen if your device supports it. Press space or 0 to lock a tile when you think it's correct.

Tiles which are connected are shown highlighted. Use the menu to select different skill levels, pause the game, or start a new game.

Tap the screen to resume.
下水道工人 作者：熊彪

At Insane level, the board edges wrap around; cells on the right edge connect to those on the left edge, and vice versa. Similarly for the top and bottom edges. But in addition, in cells with 3 or 4 connections, the wiring is invisible. Good luck!
Congratulations! You solved the puzzle in %1$d:%2$02d, using %3$d clicks, and with %4$d pieces left over!\n\nClick "New Game" for a new game, or "Continue" to experiment with this layout.
